properties.name: analytics.processing.batch-size
properties.description: Batch size for processing operations. Must be between 100 and 100,000.

properties.name: analytics.processing.parallel-processing
properties.description: Enable parallel processing for batch operations.

properties.name: analytics.processing.max-threads
properties.description: Maximum number of threads for parallel processing. Must be between 1 and 100.

properties.name: analytics.processing.chunk-size
properties.description: Chunk size for processing large datasets. Must be between 100 and 50,000.

properties.name: analytics.processing.retention-days
properties.description: Data retention period in days. Must be between 1 and 3650 (10 years).

properties.name: analytics.real-time.enabled
properties.description: Enable real-time analytics processing.

properties.name: analytics.real-time.window-size-minutes
properties.description: Sliding window size in minutes for real-time aggregation. Must be between 1 and 60.

properties.name: analytics.real-time.aggregation-interval-seconds
properties.description: Aggregation interval in seconds. Must be between 5 and 300.

properties.name: analytics.real-time.alert-thresholds.transaction-volume
properties.description: Transaction volume alert threshold. Must be at least 1.

properties.name: analytics.real-time.alert-thresholds.error-rate
properties.description: Error rate alert threshold (0.0-1.0). Must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

properties.name: analytics.real-time.alert-thresholds.response-time-ms
properties.description: Response time alert threshold in milliseconds. Must be at least 100.

properties.name: analytics.ml.enabled
properties.description: Enable machine learning features.

properties.name: analytics.ml.model-training.auto-retrain
properties.description: Enable automatic model retraining.

properties.name: analytics.ml.model-training.retrain-interval-hours
properties.description: Model retraining interval in hours. Must be between 1 and 720 (30 days).

properties.name: analytics.ml.model-training.min-data-points
properties.description: Minimum data points required for model training. Must be at least 1,000.

properties.name: analytics.ml.fraud-detection.model-path
properties.description: Absolute path to fraud detection model. Must start with /.

properties.name: analytics.ml.fraud-detection.threshold
properties.description: Fraud detection confidence threshold (0.0-1.0).

properties.name: analytics.ml.fraud-detection.feature-extraction
properties.description: Enable automatic feature extraction.

properties.name: analytics.ml.recommendation.model-path
properties.description: Absolute path to recommendation model. Must start with /.

properties.name: analytics.ml.recommendation.collaborative-filtering
properties.description: Enable collaborative filtering for recommendations.

properties.name: analytics.ml.recommendation.content-based
properties.description: Enable content-based filtering for recommendations.

properties.name: analytics.etl.enabled
properties.description: Enable ETL processes.

properties.name: analytics.etl.schedule
properties.description: Cron expression for ETL job scheduling. Must be a valid cron expression.

properties.name: analytics.etl.parallel-jobs
properties.description: Number of parallel ETL jobs. Must be between 1 and 20.

properties.name: analytics.reporting.enabled
properties.description: Enable reporting features.

properties.name: analytics.reporting.formats
properties.description: Supported report formats. At least one format must be configured.

properties.name: analytics.dashboard.refresh-interval-seconds
properties.description: Dashboard refresh interval in seconds. Must be between 5 and 300.

properties.name: analytics.dashboard.cache-duration-minutes
properties.description: Dashboard cache duration in minutes. Must be between 1 and 60.

properties.name: analytics.dashboard.real-time-updates
properties.description: Enable real-time dashboard updates.

properties.name: analytics.dashboard.max-data-points
properties.description: Maximum data points to display. Must be between 100 and 10,000.

properties.name: analytics.retention.raw-data-days
properties.description: Raw data retention period in days. Must be between 1 and 3650 (10 years).

properties.name: analytics.retention.aggregated-data-days
properties.description: Aggregated data retention period in days. Must be between 1 and 3650 (10 years).

properties.name: analytics.retention.ml-training-data-days
properties.description: ML training data retention period in days. Must be between 1 and 3650 (10 years).

properties.name: analytics.retention.audit-logs-days
properties.description: Audit logs retention period in days. Must be between 1 and 3650 (10 years).

properties.name: analytics.retention.cleanup-schedule
properties.description: Cron expression for cleanup job scheduling. Must be a valid cron expression.

properties.name: analytics.performance.query-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Query timeout in seconds. Must be between 30 and 3600 (1 hour).

properties.name: analytics.performance.connection-pool-size
properties.description: Database connection pool size. Must be between 5 and 100.

properties.name: analytics.performance.cache-size-mb
properties.description: Cache size in megabytes. Must be between 64 and 4096 (4 GB).

properties.name: analytics.quality.completeness-threshold
properties.description: Data completeness threshold (0.0-1.0).

properties.name: analytics.quality.accuracy-threshold
properties.description: Data accuracy threshold (0.0-1.0).

properties.name: influxdb.url
properties.description: InfluxDB server URL. Must start with http:// or https://.

properties.name: influxdb.token
properties.description: InfluxDB authentication token (sensitive). Keep this secret.

properties.name: influxdb.org
properties.description: InfluxDB organization name. Alphanumeric, hyphens, and underscores only.

properties.name: influxdb.bucket
properties.description: InfluxDB bucket name. Alphanumeric, hyphens, and underscores only.

properties.name: spark.app-name
properties.description: Spark application name for identification.

properties.name: spark.master
properties.description: Spark master URL (local, standalone, YARN, Mesos, or Kubernetes).

properties.name: spark.sql.adaptive.enabled
properties.description: Enable Spark adaptive query execution (AQE).

properties.name: spark.sql.adaptive.coalescePartitions.enabled
properties.description: Enable automatic partition coalescing in AQE.

properties.name: spark.executor.memory
properties.description: Executor memory allocation. Format: number + unit (k/m/g/t), e.g., '2g'.

properties.name: spark.executor.cores
properties.description: Number of cores per executor. Must be at least 1.

properties.name: spark.driver.memory
properties.description: Driver memory allocation. Format: number + unit (k/m/g/t), e.g., '1g'.

properties.name: health.circuit-breaker.enabled
properties.description: Enable circuit breaker pattern for resilience.

properties.name: health.rate-limiter.enabled
properties.description: Enable rate limiting for API protection.

properties.name: feature.flags.dual-auth-mode.enabled
properties.description: Enable dual authentication mode (legacy JWT + Keycloak).

properties.name: feature.flags.keycloak-only.enabled
properties.description: Enable Keycloak-only authentication mode.

properties.name: feature.flags.legacy-jwt-deprecation-warning.enabled
properties.description: Show deprecation warnings for legacy JWT authentication.

values.description: Local mode with all available cores
